AND SN LIKE #snLike#

AND F.PACKAGE = #package#
AND SN LIKE #snLike#

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE CREATE_TIME > CURDATE()) AS todayRegCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE CREATE_TIME > ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -7 DAY)) AS weekRegCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE CREATE_TIME > ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 MONTH)) AS monthRegCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) from HDM_DEVICE ) AS totalRegCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE ERR_GRADE = 0) AS normalCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE ERR_GRADE = 1) AS minorCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE ERR_GRADE = 2) AS majorCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDM_DEVICE WHERE ERR_GRADE = 3) AS criticalCount FROM DUAL
